about_the_game:
DISCLAIMER: Break Games is only suitable for creators on Twitch! The games can only be played by using streaming software and are designed for any Twitch creator no matter the size of their audience.

Break Games is designed so Twitch creators can take a break. Start a game, and let your viewers play it. Replace your countdown timer with a game, and start streaming to an engaged audience. Take a break while not stressing about decreasing the viewership numbers #selfcare💜routine. Mods can start new games. Break Games comes with three different games:

Stream Invaders: While you are working on the toilet, your viewers are coordinating the defence against alien domination! Look at them go, working together to prioritise targets and reach a new high score.

Cuby: Cuby is a cute bouncing cube that will swipe away emotes placed by viewers. Emotes that survive Cuby's bouncing rage will gain points! You can also use your profile picture, or let it switch between your emotes.

Victory Dance: Dance until you are hit! Who will dance to victory? Play the thrilling giveaway game.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.14
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Storage: 4 MB available space

name: Break Games

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2 GHz Processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB (DX 11 recommended)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 4 GHz Processor or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 780 GTX or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: In need of a small break while streaming? Launch a break game and let your community defend your stream from an alien invasion or get them riled up with an exclusive giveaway game! Break Games offer fun games to engage your community while you are on a short break!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil
